history.proof: intros a b c H. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec (a * c) (b * c)) as [H1 | H1], (Rle_dec a b) as [H2 | H2]. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: Rmult_le_compat_l, Rmax_opp_Rmin, RmaxRmult, Rmin_opp_Rmax, Rmax_le_compat. - sfirstorder use: Rmult_le_reg_r, Rmult_0_r unfold: Rle. - sfirstorder use: Rmult_le_compat_r. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: Rmult_le_compat_l, Rmax_opp_Rmin, RmaxRmult, Rmin_opp_Rmax, Rmax_le_compat.

original: intros a b c H. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec (a * c) (b * c)) as [H1 | H1], (Rle_dec a b) as [H2 | H2]. - apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. apply Rmax_le_compat; auto. - apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. rewrite Rmax_opp_Rmin. rewrite Rmin_opp_Rmax. apply Rmax_le_compat; auto. - apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. rewrite Rmax_opp_Rmin. apply Rmax_le_compat; auto. - apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. rewrite RmaxRmult. apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. apply Rmax_le_compat; auto.
